p: Piper aduncum L. and Piper hispidinervum C. EOs were encapsulated in gelatin nanoparticles, in the presence Tween 80, PCL, Span 60 and caprylic/capric triglyceride acid during the homogenization process [ 141]. The prepared nanoparticles were tested against Aedes aegypti Linn., Tetranychus urticae Koch., and Cerataphis lataniae Boisd. The investigation proved an encapsulation efficiency of the oils up to 1000 μg × mL −1, while their controlled release was described by the anomalous mechanism of Korsmeyer–Peppas.
